SEARCH
Package gw.api.rest.validation

Interface ValidatorContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
JsonValidatorContext, ParameterValidatorContext
public interface ValidatorContext
Common interface for both JsonValidatorContext and ParameterValidatorContext, to allow simple scalar validators to share implementations across both contexts.

  • Method Details

    • addError

      void addError(@NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") @NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") String messageKey, @NotNull @NotNull Object... messageArgs)
      Adds a validation error based on the context. In parameter validators, this will attach the error to the parameter, while in json validators, this will attach the error to the property if the property's line number is known, and otherwise to the containing object.
      Parameters:
      messageKey - the display key to use for the error message
      messageArgs - the arguments to that display key, if any
